Herbaria - Plant Care App

Herbaria helps users identify plant species, visualize all the plants they care for, and receive tasks and notifications to remind them of their plant care routine, among many other features.

Tasks for Plant Care and Weather Card

Take good care of your plants with daily tasks based on each species and fun tasks. Plus, a card will remind you of the current weather in your area.

Identify your plant with Machine Learning

Identify your plants with a machine learning system that will show you the species and take you to the identified plant's detail screen.

Details and Information for Each Plant

View the details of each plant species, including how much water and sunlight it needs, its ideal temperature range, suitable environment, and whether it is toxic. Additionally, see a summary describing the plant.

Personalized plant suggestions just for you

View plant suggestions based on various filters, ranked by the ones that suit you best. With automatic filters, like local climate and humidity, and manual filters, such as the amount of care the plant needs, sunlight requirements, plant type, environment type, and more.

Customize your plants your way.

Customize your plants with a nickname, location in the house, photo, and more..

Herbaria Numbers

Below are the numbers Herbaria has already achieved and the future plans we aim to accomplish with the project.

Downloads

With over 400 users, Herbaria now has a large base of plant lovers.

App Views

The app has already reached more than 5,000 visits on its App Store page in these months, becoming a popular app in the gardening community.

World App

Herbaria has users in 42 different countries, because care and love for plants are universal.

Future of Herbaria

Herbaria has future plans for major features in the app and community, aiming to further establish the app as a reference in the plant sector.
